Package com.tangosol.net

Interface PagedTopicService

  • All Superinterfaces:
    CacheService, ClassLoaderAware, Controllable, DistributedCacheService, PartitionedService, Service, Service, TopicService
    public interface PagedTopicService
extends TopicService, DistributedCacheService
    A TopicService which provides globally ordered topics.
